page.title: 18BYPASS - ATTITUDES
page.content: {BATHEASTON}-Villagers having long fought for bypass welcome new move. {Traders}in{High Street}pleased. Unhappy resident claims that one plan would include a deep{cutting}along his property and another a high level {flyover. {BATHAMPTON}-One scheme will carve up the land of a{garden nursery}& in owner's opinion Bathampton would be ruined. {SWAINSWICK}-Concern that{Alice Park could be divided under one scheme. {BATHFORD}-I live in Bathford & teach in Bath.Sundays,journey time is{6 mins. Remaining 6 days takes{35-60 mins. Reason for discrepancy is enormous volume of traffic{"bottlenecked"}into narrow main street of Batheaston. Incalculable{frustration}&{stress}to people and environment.
